message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses a method for securing the Internet of Things (IoT) against security threats using cryptographic authentication. This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and network security (cs.NI). The paper also proposes a routing protocol based on trust and intelligence, which could fall under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The use of machine learning and artificial intelligence for detecting attacks could also place the paper under the category of software engineering (cs.SE) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
